definition: bright-colored, to mark with a bouy or other sea-borne marker
details:
noun
- bright-colored
verb
- to mark with a bouy or other sea-borne marker
= example: to mark with a bouy or other sea-borne marker
- to keep afloat
= example: to keep afloat
= synonyms: buoy up
- to float on the surface of water
= example: to float on the surface of water
